rules.description: wm flag + left shift + left command window keybinds

to.shell_command: /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --display next || /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --display first; /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m display --focus next || /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m display --focus first

rules.description: wm flag + left shift window keybinds
wm flag + left command window keybinds

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Spotify" -e 'set player position to 0' -e 'previous track' -e 'end tell'

rules.description: double command + left command yabai settings
double command + left shift yabai related settings
enter to left control when held
